title: Neeko Any Skin?

embed.description: The Special/Hidden/Secret Interactions for the new champion, Neeko. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): https://amzn.to/2qZ3Bmv Shows all the specific mimics, first encounters etc Neeko has. Stay upto date with information by following me on twitter: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

body:
The video only shows her transforming into default skins. Can she mimic any skin?
 If so, that's a lot of work. Including she'll need a rework for every future skin.
If not, then all her teammates will want default to trick other team.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
